VRK.description1: Is a digital asset created for the Vrakka ecosystem that seeks to revalue itself, based on Blockchain technology supported on BSC, developed by a team of experts.
VRK.description2: VRK Token as a product is a great solution to introduce people to the world of digital assets and allow them to receive financial rewards for fulfilling their habits.

NFT.title: Hyperhabits Multiverse
NFT.firsttextbox: Join us to save our planet and help humanity Grow & Win. This collection is created to improve the quality of life in people and the realization of their good habits.
NFT.secondtextbox: A 12,000 NFT collection that potentiates the obtention of VRK tokens and allows you to get benefits within a very broad ecosystem!

About.title: What is Hyperhabits Multiverse?
About.text: It is a collection of NFTs created in the Vrakka ecosystem to encourage users to seek to improve their quality of life by performing good habits. The collection is based on a story, where the NFTs are "heroes" who come to earth to help users improve their lives, so that they can contribute to society to save the world.
About.text2: The NFT has a utility In the ecosystem , becoming a master key to access multiple benefits.
About.desc: We are here to save the world!
